value.title: Insert text anywhere in a cell without adding a new column using the Power Query User Interface.
value.excerpt: There are no Insert functions ( that I know about) in the power query user interface, so if you dont know M, you probably have to create a new column to insert text in power query.  In today's video, I will show you how you can use power query user interface, to insert text into a column without adding

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead.  Processing Options:  https://docs.microsoft.com/analysis-services/multidimensional-models/processing-options-and-settings-analysis-services?view=asallproducts-allversions

value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Adam explores the data protection capabilities within Power BI using security labels and cloud app security.
